name: Ham and Mushroom Alfredo
ingredients: 1/2 cup freshly grated parmesan cheese, 2 ounces
utensils: Very large skillet or large saucepan

instructions.en: Sauté mushrooms in butter until tender; remove and set aside.
instructions.sk: Opražte huby na masle do mäkka; vyberte a odložte bokom.
instructions.ja: バターでマッシュルームを柔らかくなるまで炒めます。取り出して脇に置きます。

instructions.en: In the same pan, melt cream cheese on low heat. Gradually whisk in cream until smooth.
instructions.sk: V tej istej panvici roztopte krémový syr na miernom ohni. Postupne vmiešajte smotanu do hladka.
instructions.ja: 同じフライパンで、弱火でクリームチーズを溶かします。少しずつクリームを加えて滑らかになるまで混ぜます。

instructions.en: Stir in parmesan and seasonings. Cook until parmesan has melted.
instructions.sk: Vmiešajte parmezán a korenie. Varte, kým sa parmezán neroztopí.
instructions.ja: パルメザンチーズと調味料を加えて混ぜます。パルメザンが溶けるまで調理します。

instructions.en: Stir in ham, mushrooms, and parsley. Heat through on low heat. Add chives if using.
instructions.sk: Vmiešajte šunku, huby a petržlenovú vňať. Prehrejte na miernom ohni. Pridajte pažítku, ak používate.
instructions.ja: ハム、マッシュルーム、パセリを加えて混ぜます。弱火で温めます。お好みでチャイブを加えます。

notes: Makes 4-6 servings. Do not freeze. Serve over broccoli, cabbage, Faux Rice or zucchini, etc. (not included in the carb count).
